body: Other than calling the police, I do not think he could have done much. Looks like doing anything to stop it would result in an extreme beating. Point is, he would have lost in the end anyways.

He did not know, but he did not put one damn inch of effort to help either when he found out and just sat there looking acting all sad and emo and shit, kid deserved to get cucked for being such a coward

Basically he was told of the dangers of earning money this way by the smoking guy and how he will never be happy from now on, and how her sacrifice is not comparable to his silly debt, or something like that, then he just sat there like a wimp the whole time thinking of how he used to fap in the toilet alone when he got aroused of her eating noodles, at the end he tries to ask the smoking man to let them go, man says no, that's it and the he leaves, yep that's all, kid was a bitch cuck
@NERDS Yeah he is just a little bitch and sat there doing nothing, there really is very little info on the aftermath, a part 2 would be welcome
@nhcasual are you sure he didn't know? because they told her that her boyfriend had already signed the contract and he didn't say shit and just sat there and watched at first.

For those who are curious, I used a PC program called capture2text which when you press windows button+Q allows you to take a OCR snapshot of an area on your screen and if you have internet translates whatever you dragged a box over, disclaimer that you do have to sometimes use further translators and some of your own knowledge of basic japanese to fill in translation errors sometimes

To add to my last comment, I tried to check what FMC herself is saying about the gangbang but she really is not saying much at all, she is mostly just calling out for "Yuuki" which I assume is the MC's name and thinking that she hates it, there is very little of what she herself thinks about it, seems like she was just mind broken at the end with little info on her own thoughts on the matter

Basically from what I can gather from a cheap google translate, MC was in debt and asked the FMC to work in a bikini modeling job to get money and she agrees, but neither knew it was a porn job, but when the MC tries to intervene and help the FMC says she will go ahead with the job anyway, so the MC sits in a corner like a good little cuck bitch and watches as FMC is gangbanged, at the end the men make a deal for MC to get money for her jobs in the future, the end. 

Pretty basic NTR plot nothing new here
The boyfriend messed up bad for not realizing what he was getting his girlfriend into 😞
What's the heck, is he set up this or just.....
Anybody know the name of the artist?
Maybe the guy see the ad how to make money and didnt know that it was to make AV
Why didn't he attack those guys with the chair or something when they started?
What's the story here please? The reason why the fuck her boyfriend set up her?
